text: Bourreria velutina is a species of plant in the family Boraginaceae. It is endemic to Jamaica.World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Bourreria velutina. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 1998. Downloaded on 25 September 2015. ==References== velutina Category:Endangered plants Category:Endemic flora of Jamaica Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
